About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

This year I wanted to better my life and the life for my family. So I decided to pursue a career in web development. With hard work, determination, and self motivation, I am making that dream come true.

Base Languages

Http, CSS, Javascript, and Python

I feel very comfortable with these. I've had much practice with them making mock sites. I feel like I can use these in a professional environment. I have started using Python for the backend and using Django with it.

Tools

JQuery, Bootstrap, Sass, and Git

I have used all of these in different projects. I have more experience with Git, Bootstrap, and Sass than JQuery, but still able to use them efficiently. I usually use JQuery and Bootstrap to give projects a little style because thay are more focused on code.

Framework

Node.js, React, Redux, Angular, and Django

Out of React and Angular, I favor React. I have used it for mutiply projects, including Lyric Finder, Contact Manager, Team Generator, and a Todo List. I have started using Redux in a few React apps. I usually use Django whenever I use Python.
